prompts.text.correct.oai: Correct spelling and grammar in the following text
prompts.text.rephrase.oai: Make this text sound friendly and conversational. Stick to the modern American English grammar and style
prompts.tags.oai: Create no more than 10 keywords that describe the following text. Make sure that every keyword is a meaningful word or a short phrase. Do not offer a functional part of speech or introductory words as a keyword. Do not use the same word as a keyword more than once. Do not add any markup, numbers or bullets
prompts.summary.page.create.oai: Generate as many as %d ideas for an article on the following topic
prompts.title.page.create.oai: Create a title for the following text
prompts.subtitle.page.create.oai: Summarize the following text in %d words
prompts.imageprompt.page.create.oai: Create a prompt for the DALL-E image generator to create an image on the following topic: "%s". The prompt must specify an arbitrary type of framing, an arbitrary shoot context, an arbitrary type of lighting, and an arbitrary usage context. Example: 'A close up studio photographic portrait of a robot, soft lighting, a photo from Life Magazine'. The result must not exceed 400 characters.
prompts.title.page.findings.oai: Formulate 2 findings (no more than 12 words each) suitable for a conclusion of an article from the following text
